ValidationRule.description: Fields required before you can close/win a VLS opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(TEXT( StageName)= "6- Closed Won", $User.ProfileId = "00ef2000000zIBv", OR(ISBlank(Amount ), Amount<=1, ISBlank(Customer_Selling_Margin_Rate__c ), ISBlank(Description ), ISPICKVAL( Invoicing__c , ""), ISPICKVAL( POD_Required__c , ""), ISBlank( UnisourceFreight_Password__c ), ISBlank( UnisourceFreight_Username__c ), ISBlank( Bill_to_Number__c )
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before marking this Opportunity as Closed/Won, Opportunity Revenue must exceed $1, and the following fields must be filled in: Description, Margin, Invoicing, POD, VeritivFreight Username & Password, and Billto Number
